Description: Add parts from your hard drive to the bed.
Drag primitives to the bed to create your own designs.
Browse your library to find parts you have previously designed.
Click here to start a print. This will also help you setup a printer if needed.
Click here to start a print.
Your printers hotend controls. Set your temperatures, materials and load & unload filament.
Have compete control of your printer with the ability to adjust individual print settings.
Reset the view, change viewing modes, hide and show the bed, and adjust the grid snap.
Adjust the position of your view. You can also snap to specific views by clicking the cube.
Create custom supports. Turn any object on the bed into support material.
Here you can find application settings, help docs, updates and more.
Click here to sign into you MatterHackers account.
Setup a printer for the first time. Dozens of profiles are available to give you optimized settings.
Change your color theme anytime you want.
